name: normal
description: This project can be use as a starting point for developing your new Stellar Soroban Test Network SubQuery project

scripts.start:docker: docker compose pull && docker compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.dev: subql codegen && subql build && docker compose pull && docker compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.build:develop: NODE_ENV=develop subql codegen && NODE_ENV=develop subql build

author: joshuablew
